pageProduct.name: Schwarzkopf Extra Care Normal Balance Nourishing Express Repair Conditioner 250ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

The NORMAL BALANCE range for all hair types offers COMPLETE NOURISHMENT to keep hair looking healthy and full of shine.

Your hair requires a dose of nourishment to keep it looking healthy and full of shine.
EXTRA CARE NORMAL BALANCE offers:
+ DEEP NOURISHMENT WITHOUT OVERBURDENING
+ IMMEDIATE DETANGLING
+ HEALTHY SHINE

Made In Australia
100% Recyclable via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for more details.

Suitable For: All Hair Types

Size: 250mL

Hair Type: All Hair Types

KEY FEATURES

• Deep Nourishment, Detangling & Healthy Shine
• 100% Recyclable via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for more details
• EXTRA CARE formulas with LIQUID KERATIN & ADVANCED HAIR
TECHNOLOGY help repair existing
damage and provide protection with visibly improved hair
quality.

Warnings

No

Ingredients

Aqua · Cyclomethicone · Phenyl Trimethicone · Dimethiconol · Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone · Lactic Acid · Polyquaternium-16 · Laurdimonium Hydroxypropyl Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein · Tocopheryl Acetate · Cetrimonium Chloride · Fragrance · Sodium Benzoate · Sodium PCA · Panthenol · Hydrolyzed Keratin

Directions

After shampooing and conditioning, spray evenly into hair. Do not spray into eyes. USE ON: Dry or towel-dried hair. Leave in. Style as usual.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Bottle is Kerbside Recyclable. Pump & Cap can be recycled via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for details

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes

Recycling Code: 2 PEHD or HDPE
